name: Vegetarian Vietnamese Spring Rolls
author: Wendy Likly-Welch
summary: A refreshing fresh vegetarian spring roll... The hoisin sauce mix gives this recipe its special taste! Serve with hot red chile sauce, hoisin sauce mix, and chopped peanuts.
ingredients: ½ head iceberg lettuce, finely shredded
2  carrots, peeled and cut into thin matchsticks
1  cucumber - peeled, seeded, and cut into thin matchsticks
directions: Place noodles in a large bowl and cover with hot water
Set aside until noodles are softened, about 15 minutes
Fill a shallow baking dish with hot water
Soak 1 rice paper in the hot water until softened, 5 to 10 seconds
Lay flat on a work surface
Place a thin layer of rice noodles, iceberg lettuce, bean sprouts, daikon, cabbage, carrots, cucumber, mizuna, and Thai basil near the top
Fold in sides and roll up rice paper to enclose the filling
Mix hoisin sauce and applesauce together in a small bowl
